sen.j: 大炊御門 冬忠（おおいのみかど ふゆただ、建保6年（1218年） - 文永5年9月9日 (旧暦)（1268年10月16日））は、鎌倉時代中期の公卿。
sen.e: Fuyutada OINOMIKADO (大炊御門 冬忠, 1218 - October 23, 1268) was a Kugyo (high court noble) in the mid Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 「文永5年9月9日」はグレゴリオ暦で「1268年10月23日」、ユリウス暦で「1268年10月16日」だそうです。

sen.e: He worked for the five Imperial Courts from Emperor Gohorikawa (the 86th generation) to Emperor Kameyama (the 90th generation), and rose up to Shosanmi Naidaijin (Senior Third Rank, Minister of the Interior) in official court ranks.

sen.e: He was appointed successively to Jiju (Chamberlain), Suo no suke (Assistant Governor of Suo Province), Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), and Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), and in 1239, he was promoted to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) to rank with a Kugyo (high court noble).
